title: 11 Expert-Recommended Foods for Running Energy & Recovery
description: Key foods like bananas, berries, peanut butter and eggs improve energy and muscle recovery for runners.

sections.title: Top Foods for Energy & Recovery
sections.content:
Runners benefit from a mix of carbohydrates, healthy fats, and protein. Some top choices include:
 - Peanut Butter: high in fat, protein, and fiber—delays fatigue.
 - Eggs: high-quality protein and choline for muscle strength.
- Bananas: rich in carbs and potassium to prevent cramps.
 - Berries: antioxidants reduce inflammation.
 …and more nutritious options for post-run recovery.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
sections.content: Incorporating a variety of these foods into your post-run meals can boost energy, aid muscle repair, and prevent cramps.
